english.segment1: One man, one mission. One plot to save the world. Reclaim all races. And embrace our destiny
english.segment2: Changing history when the colliding comes. Where will you run. Come with us if you want to live
english.segment3: Join us in the army that's arising. The truth invades your mind. Every day the Kingdom is advancing. The earth invasion has just begun
english.segment4: Without a sound, without fear. It attacks the heart and soul. To rule all life and display His government
english.segment5: Join us in the army that's arising. The truth invades your mind. Every day the Kingdom is advancing. The earth invasion has just begun. Join us in the army that's arising. The truth invades your mind. Every day the Kingdom is advancing. The earth invasion has just begun
english.segment6: The earth's frustration. To be whole again. We'll see a nation. Living without sin
english.segment7: The earth invasion. One man, one mission. One plot to save the world
english.segment8: Join us in the army that's arising. The truth invades your mind. Every day the Kingdom is advancing. The earth invasion has just begun
